ValidationRule.description: Makes sure Associated Partner is completed for Advisor leads
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( LeadSource , "Advisor") && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Lead_Type__c, "Advisor")) && ( ISBLANK( Associated_Partner__c ) = TRUE) && Eligible_for_Contact_Merge__c = FALSE && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Unable to Qualify"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add Associated Partner for Advisor leads
